titleStmt.title: A faithfvll and seasonable advice, or, The necessity of a correspondencie for the advancement of the Protestant cause humbly suggested to the great councell of England assembled in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Hartlib. cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
